page.title: 18Transport in South Bradford.
page.content: The area is well served by several{bus {routes}with a proposed new route to be hopefully established soon.No{bus} {station}is sited in the vicinity,the nearest being in the{centre of} {Bradford.}Convenient bus services link the area to the Bradford{Interchange} where buses,coaches and trains depart to all parts of the country.A further railway station takes passengers N and W.From the Interchange there are bus links to the{Leeds/Bradford airport,} recently enlarged to take jumbo jets. Motor vehicles have a ready access to all parts of the block,though many streets are cul-de-sacs due to modernisation about 8 years ago.3 main roads pass through the area and the {M606}links Bradford with the{motorway} {system.}However Bradford has always been on the fringe of major road and rail networks.
